plot:
The
Increasingly Poor Decisions of Todd Margaret is an American-British comedy starring David Cross, Sharon Horgan,
Blake Harrison, Will Arnett, and Spike Jonze. The series is produced by IFC and
RDF Television and premiered on October 1, 2010 on IFC. The show comprises two
seasons, totaling 12 episodes, broadcast in 2010 and 2012.
